What happened to your arm, Aytolun?
I was injured while fighting Selcan.
What do you say?
Bani Çiçek met Selcan.. ..at Karakayas.
How dare you!
How could you let this happen, Aytolun?
I had to.
What do you mean you had to?
Why didn't you tell the Alps?
Why?

text: Banı Çiçek, Selcan’a cinayetleri bizim işlediğimizi ispat edecek…
english: Bani Cicek will prove that we committed the Selcana murders...
...he was going to give evidence, Dad.
What do you think, Goncagül?
What evidence?
We don't know.
I went there to kill them both.
I couldn't say anything to anyone, brother.
I was afraid the evidence would fall into someone else's hands.

text: Bu bizim sonumuz olurdu baba, sonumuz
english: It would be the end of us, Father, the end of us.
What about the Bayflower?
Where is he?
He ran away to give the evidence to Ertugrul.
If Ertugrul lives...
It would be a disaster for all of us, brother.
Son of a bitch, it's over.
We're going to bring down his reign.

text: Uç beyi değil, bir zorba olacağını şimdiden gösterdi hepimize
english: He's already shown us that he'll become a tyrant, not a flymaster.

text: Dağıttığı altınlarla günahlarını satın almaya kalkar
english: He tries to buy his sins with the gold he distributes

text: O altınların bedelini, minnet eden beylerden fazlasıyla çıkaracaktır
english: He'll pay the price for the gold more than most grateful gentlemen.

text: Tabii önce biz onun hesabını görmezsek
english: Unless we take care of him first.
It's time for the reckoning, Mother Hayme.

text: Gayrı bundan sonra olacaklar hiç kolay olmayacak oğul
english: It won't be easy what happens next, son.
He won't stop until he kills you.

text: Beni öldürmesi için fırsatı ona çoktan verdim ana
english: I've already given him the chance to kill me, Ana.

text: Banı Çiçek’ten delili almaya gideceğimi bilir
english: She knows I'm going to get the evidence from Flower.
He'll come after me with his soldiers.
And when you catch us both together...
...will have the opportunity.

text: Bana düşen de ona aradığı fırsatı vermek olacak
english: And it's up to me to give him the opportunity he's looking for.

text: Onca askerle nasıl baş edeceksin oğul?
english: How are you going to deal with all those soldiers, son?
And those soldiers will do their duty

text: Bir tekinin burnu kanasa, ahı bizden çıkmaz mı?
english: If someone gets a nosebleed, won't they come out of us?
What if they kill you?
Don't worry, Mother Hayme.
We will not let Ertugrul Bey out of our sight.

text: Tek bir askerimizin bile burnu kanamayacak ana
english: Not a single soldier's nose will bleed, Mother.
If I don't get my hands on the silver one...
...it's all over.
But that's not what scares me.
What is it, son?

text: Gümüştekin peşime takılana kadar ne edeceğini hiçbirimiz bilemeyiz
english: None of us know what the silver will do until it's after me.
We've got a long night ahead of us.

text: Bu gece boş durmayacaklardır Akşam ben yemeğe gelmeyeceğim
english: They won't be idle tonight. I won't be coming to dinner tonight.
But you'll all be my eyes and ears

text: Söyledikleri her söz, yaptıkları her şey bizim için büyük bir tehdit olacaktır
english: Every word they say, everything they do will be a threat to us.

text: Gözünüzü de, kulağınızı da iyi açasınız
english: Keep your eyes and ears open.

text: Seni yalnız göndermek çok ağırıma gider kardeşim
english: It's too much for me to send you alone, brother.
I know you'll be there for me with your prayers, brother.
You can rest.
Thanks.
Mr. Gündüz

text: Kolunuzu merak ettim beyim Sizi görmek istedim
english: I was curious about your arm, sir. I wanted to see you.
I'm fine. It's no big deal.
If you need anything, don't hesitate.
You know, I'm always there for you.

text: Tıpkı senin babamın uç beyliğinin arkasında durduğun gibi
english: Just like you stood behind my father's mastery of flight.
I wanted to thank you again.
For our government.
...I want him Goncagül Hatun
You have no idea how happy I am.

text: Gayrı bizi birbirimize düşürmeye çalışanlar nikâhımıza engel olamayacaktır
english: Those who try to turn us against each other will not be able to stop us from getting married.

text: İnşallah nikâhımızla otağımız daha da şen olacak beyim
english: I hope our marriage will be more joyous, my lord.

text: İnşallah tez vakitte otağımız da, obamız da şen olacak
english: Hopefully soon, we'll have a happy bed and a happy one.
But I don't see you well, sir.

text: Kolundan mıdır, yoksa başka bir derdin mi vardır bilemedim
english: I don't know if it's your arm or something.
I think of my uncle's killer, Goncagül Hatun

text: Onlar belasını bulmadan içim feraha ermeyecek
english: I won't rest until they're in trouble.
They'll find it, sir. They'll find it.
Inshallah.

text: Onların nasıl acıyla yalvararak öldüklerini görmeden…
english: I didn't see them die begging in pain.
I'm not going to be comfortable.
That's all I want
If you'll excuse me, sir.
If you'll excuse me.
Did you hear the serpent's words?
I heard, sir.

text: Yarabbi, gözümün içine baka baka yalan konuşur
english: Oh, my God, he'll lie to me in front of me.
How could I believe that woman?
Selcan, after everything I've done to you...

text: …sana bunca söylediklerimden sonra sen beni nasıl affedersin?
english: How can you forgive me after all I've told you?

text: Senin zerrece günahın yoktur ki beyim
english: You have no sin, my lord.

text: Benim gibi günahkâr bir kadını bağışlayan sen değil miydin?
english: Aren't you the one who forgave a sinful woman like me?

text: Günahlarıma o Umman kadar kocaman yüreğinde böyle yer açmayaydın…
english: You should have made room for my sins in your heart as big as Oman...
I wouldn't be here today.

text: Selcan, bundan gayrı ömrümün son gününe kadar…
english: Selcan, from this to the last day of my life...
I want you to be there for me.

text: Başka da bir şey istemem rabbimden
english: I don't want anything else from my God.
Thank God.

text: İki obayı böyle birlik içinde görmek beni ziyadesiyle memnun eder
english: I'm very pleased to see two obas in such unity.

text: Gayrı Kayılar ve Dodurgalar el ele vererek…
english: The Unsubs and Dodurga join hands...
...we'll be stronger.
You're right, Mr. Silver.

text: Uç beyliğiniz, bizi Türkmen beyleri arasında daha da güçlendirmiştir
english: Your highness has made us stronger among the Turkishmen.

text: İnşallah bu birliğimiz, sizin uç beyliğinizle birlikte her daim devam eder
english: I hope this unit will continue with your highness.
May God not destroy our unity, our unity.
Amen.
Amen.
Amen, amen.
Aytolun, what happened to your arm?

text: Mühim bir şey değil Ufak bir sıyrık
english: It's nothing. It's just a scratch.
Yeah.
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, I'm so sorry.
Get well soon.
Thank you, Hayme Hatun.

text: Korkut Bey’imin katilleri hesap verir vermez…
english: As soon as Mr. Korkum's killers answer...

text: …civardaki diğer Türkmen obalarını da ziyarete gideceğim
english: I'm going to visit other Turkishmen in the area.

text: Sağ olsunlar uç beyliğimiz için gerekli desteği ziyadesiyle vererek…
english: Thank you very much for giving us the support we need for our flying fiefdom.
...they've made us proud.

text: Lakin sonra da Gündoğdu Bey’imle kızımın nikâhını görmek isterim
english: But then I'd like to see Mr. Gündüz and my daughter's wedding.

text: Dediğiniz gibi beyim, adalet tez gelsin ki…
english: As you say, sir, justice will come quickly...
...and let our vows be performed at once.
Thank you, Mr. Gündüz.
You said justice, Mr. Silver.
Justice will surely come
We all know that.
My brother's killers will pay for it.
But when you say "judge justice..."
It's like you're thinking of something.

text: Doğrudur. Uç beyi olarak bu olaya da el koyacağım
english: That's right, as Master Fly, I'm going to take over this case as well.
You've made a good decision, my lord.
I don't want this matter to be resolved...
...it's time for peace to come to our rooms.
Your justice will strengthen us, Lord of Silver
Thank you, Mr. Tuğtekin. Thank you.
My first job as Master Fly...
...take nature's Alps away.

text: Korkut Bey’imin katili Banı Çiçek’in yerini öğrenmek olacak
english: The killer of Mr. Korak will be Bün Çiçek.

text: Sonra da bir an evvel infaz edilecek
english: Then he'll be executed as soon as possible.

text: Yarın sabah askerlerim Doğan Alp’i götürecek
english: Tomorrow morning, my soldiers will take the Born Alpine.

text: Adaletin keskin kılıcı, mühürlü dilini çözene kadar…
english: The sharp sword of justice, until it unseals its sealed tongue...
I will not leave uncut meat in your body.
The quickest thing of justice is acceptable.

text: Artık bu fitnenin obamızı zehirlemesine müsaade etmeyeceğim
english: I will no longer allow this trial to poison our oba.

text: Gayrı bundan böyle Korkut Bey’imin katilini bulup, intikamını almak…
english: From now on, we will find the murderer of Mr. Korkut and avenge him...
...is the debt of my neck.
Don't let our fly master get killed.

text: Ertuğrul Bey’in inadıyla huzurumuzun bozulmasını istemeyiz
english: We don't want to ruin our peace with the stubbornness of Ertugrul Bey.

text: Böyle yaparak bizi başka bir felaketten kurtarmış oldunuz Gümüştekin Bey’im
english: By doing so, you have saved us from another disaster, Mr. Güverkin.
Way to go, Uncle Boy.

text: Bu topraklarda yetişip büyümüş bir evlat olarak…
english: As a child raised in this land...

text: …böylesine iyi bir bey olacağın en başından beri belliydi
english: ...it was clear from the beginning that you would be such a good gentleman.
Thanks.

text: Yaklaşan Nevruz’un sevinciyle kızımın nikâhı birleşecek inşallah
english: With the joy of the coming Nevruz I hope my daughter's wedding will be united
Isn't that right, girl?
I hope you don't mind. I hope you don't mind.
I'm going to pass the dirt on my past...

text: …bahar dalı gibi taze bir başlangıç için daha iyisi olamazdı
english: ...for a fresh start like a spring spring.

text: Allah size uzun ömürler versin beyim
english: May God grant you a long life, my lord.
People are tired, sir.

text: Değil kefere sınırına varıp yurt tutmak…
english: It's not like we're on the edge of the camp and we're on our way home.
...they don't even have the means to move.
What about the Alps, sir?

text: Hangi Alp'e sorsam kılıç kınında güzeldir der de başka laf etmezler
english: Every time I ask the Alps, they say it's good in a sword's sheath, but they don't say another word.

text: Velhasıl beyim, herkes sürüsünün peşinde huzur ister
english: After all, sir, everyone wants peace after their flock.
While the gentlemen strangle each other...

text: …devleti ele geçirmeye çalışan soysuzlar ahalinin gırtlağına çökmüşken?
english: ...trying to take over the state while the degenerates are at the throats of the people?
Oh, yeah?
Is this peace, Turgut?
It's not, sir.

text: Değil de içlerinde senin gibi yüreği olan kimse yoktur
english: It's not that there's no one in them who's got a heart like you.

text: Şu mavi gök altında her dağ onlara bir beyim
english: Under that blue sky, every mountain I'm a gentleman to them

text: Ne gönülleri ne de gözleri başka bir şey bilmez
english: Their hearts and eyes don't know anything else.

text: He vallahi beyim Senin yüreğin bir başkadır
english: My lord, your heart is something else.
It's big enough to get into the world of sentences.

text: Sen olmasan biz nereden bilirdik ne edeceğimizi beyim?
english: How would we know what to do without you, my lord?

text: O dağ senin, bu dağ benim…
english: That mountain is yours, this mountain is mine...

text: …artık sürü mü otlardı, biz mi otlardık Allah bilir beyim
english: ...if it was cattle or grass, we'd be grassing. God knows, sir.
It's the right thing to say, sir.
♪ It's time to put your own heart on the line ♪

text: Koyasın ki peşine düşüp Bizans sınırında yurt tutacak yiğitler ortaya çıksın
english: Put them on the trail, and let the braves who will stay on the Byzantine border come out.

text: Sözlerin kararmış gönüllere ışık olsun beyim
english: May your words shine upon the blackened hearts, my lord.
Let's put an end to this, Turgut.
After that, I'll take the matter to the next level.
Then we'll see what's going on.
Thank you, sir.

text: Şunu bil yeter, ölene kadar seninleyiz beyim
english: Just know that we're with you till you die, my lord.
I brought you a buttermilk, sir.
Oh, bless you, brother.
Da
You couldn't find tandoori bread?
Oh!
Son of a bitch!
Say it, brother.

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im Çin’e gidelim dese peşinden gider misin?
english: If Ertuğrul Bey tells you to go to China, will you go after him?

text: Ertuğrul Bey’imiz Zühre yıldızına gidiyoruz desin yeter
english: Just tell Mr. Ertugrul we're going to the Zühre star.

text: Ben kanat takar uçarım Bamsı Alp’im, bilmez misin?
english: Don't you know I wear wings and fly?
Oh, my God.
Oh, my God.

Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey,
My lord, these brave men are quite...
Where we can't go, there's no country we can't conquer.
You're welcome.
Thank you, Turgut.
Thanks.
Thank you, sir.
Maybe the right thing to do...

text: …Ertuğrul, Banı Çiçek’le buluşmazdan önce bu gece işi bitirmektir ağabey
english: Ertuğrul is to finish the job tonight before meeting Bani Çiçek.

text: Otağına girip onu öldürecek hâlim yok ya
english: It's not like I'm gonna go in your tent and kill her.
Get a hold of yourself, Aytolun.

text: Yaralı, gururu incinmiş bir erkek bunu yapabilir
english: A wounded, proud man can do that.
How?
Tugtekin

text: Avradı Gökçe’nin gönlünde yatanın kim olduğunu bilirse…
english: If Avradi knows who is in Gökçe's heart...
What do you think it's worth, big brother?
Isn't that right, Goncagül?
I'll do my best, still.
Ertuğrul. Here you are.
You were right, brother. What's up?

text: Gümüştekin, Doğan Alp’i yarın kervansaraya götürecek
english: In silver, he will take the Born Alpine to the caravan tomorrow

text: Ona işkence edeceği belli Yaşatmayacağı da kesin
english: It's obvious he's going to torture her, and it sure as hell won't.

text: Doğan Alp’i ona vermeyeceğimi iyi biliyor
english: He knows I won't give him the Alpine.

text: Gözlerinizin içine baka baka beni davet etti
english: He looked you right in the eye and invited me.

text: Onu askerlerden alırken seni öldürmek falan mıdır o soysuzun niyeti?
english: Is it the bastard's intention to kill you when you take him away from the soldiers?
No, brother.

text: Benim de katillerle iş birliği yaptığımı ispat etmek ister aklınca
english: He wants to prove to you that I'm cooperating with the killers.
When I was taking the Born Alpine...
He wants me to kill his soldiers.
So he'd say it's to show me that I'm a rebel.
And when you killed me...
...he'll be right on his own.

text: Ne senin ne de anamın söyleyecek hiçbir şeyi kalmayacak
english: Neither you nor my mother will have anything to say.
So, what are you gonna do, Ertugrul?

text: Yarın Doğan Alp’i askerlerinin elinden kan dökmeden alacağız
english: Tomorrow, we'll take the Alpine from the hands of his soldiers without bloodshed.
What about the silver one?
If I'm right...
...Nature will send the Alps ahead with its troops.
Then he'll follow us.
Let's see who falls into whose trap
Look at what we're talking about, brothers.

text: Kendimizi bildik bileli başımız beladan kurtulmadı
english: We haven't gotten out of trouble for as long as we know ourselves.

text: Ruhu şad olsun rahmetli babam ömrü boyunca Alptekin’le uğraştı
english: May his soul rest in peace. My late father has worked on the Alps all his life.
He rotted his life Then Kurdoglu
Now the silver one.
When will our suffering end?

text: Belki de bizim kaderimize düşen budur ağabey
english: Maybe that's our destiny, brother.

text: Kendi yurdumuzda kendi adaletimizi kurana kadar…
english: Until we establish our own justice in our own home...
We're doomed to what we've been through, brother.

text: Bu fitneler bizi derviş gibi terbiye eder
english: These trials will discipline us like dervish.
That's our truth, that's our situation
And it's up to us...

text: …Allah’ın izniyle bu fitnelerle savaşmaktır sonuna kadar
english: ...with the permission of God to fight these trials to the end.
That's right, my brother...
I don't have a choice.

text: Keçi güttüğüm günlerin hasretiyle yanar tutuşurum
english: I yearn for days when I've driven a goat

text: Selcan Hatun’la kocayıp göçüp gitmek isterim bu diyardan
english: I'd like to leave this land with Selcan Hatun.
I don't want anything else.
Ahh!
Brother!
It's daylight!
I'm fine. I'm fine. I want to sleep.
I'm fine.
I'd like to sleep
What is it, Goncagül Hatun?
I'm sorry, sir. I...
Goncagül
What's up?

text: Goncagül bilmemesi gereken bir şey öğrenmiştir
english: Goncagül must have learned something he shouldn't know.
It is hard for him to hear what he hears.

text: Geçmişin kara gölgesinin üzerimize çullanmasından korkar
english: He fears the dark shadow of the past will come upon us
That's all.
Excuse me, sir.

text: Bu gece öyle bir korkacaklardır ki
english: They'll be so scared tonight
Anything is expected of them.

text: O uğursuz avradın yüzüne gülüp, ana diyeceksin
english: You're going to laugh in the face of that evil bastard and say, "Madam."
And the lies of Goncagül.
You will obey the silver one

text: Bizi birbirimize düşürmek için söyleyecekleri iftiraları…
english: What they're going to say to turn us against each other...
May I?
Here you are, Mr. Tuğtekin.

text: Obamda neler olup biter bilmek isterim
english: I'd like to know what's going on in my office.
Aren't you afraid of the curse of knowing, sir?
Rather than live in lies, in rhymes...
...to be scorched in the truth.
Bravery is against the enemy, my lord.

text: Lakin canından çok sevdiklerine karşı yiğitlik hezimettir
english: But courage against those you love more than your life is destruction.
You say what you're gonna say.

text: Lafı eveleyip gevelemek bu otağın huzurunu bozar…
english: I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
...mother

text: Bunları sana demeye ne dilim ne gönlüm razı gelir beyim
english: I don't want to say this to you, sir. I don't want to say this to you.
You, too.

text: Bunca acının üzerine birini daha kaldıracak gücüm var, merak etmeyesin
english: Don't worry, I've got the strength to take someone else over all this pain.

text: O vakit Goncagül’ün işittiği şeyi senin de bilmek hakkındır
english: Then you have the right to know what Goncagül heard.
What did he hear?
What is in the heart of Sky
What do you think, Ma?
I'm afraid of your anger, son.
From another cause of pain

text: Hepsi geçmiş gitmiş, belki Gökçe kızım da unuttu…
english: It's all in the past, maybe my Gökçe daughter forgot...

text: …sildi attı yüreğindeki yarayı Günahına girmek istemem
english: I don't want to enter into your sin.
Ana, I've come to the end of my patience.
I'll take your word for it.
Mr. Ertugrul

text: Ertuğrul Bey, Halime Sultan’ı keferenin elinden kurtarmazdan çok önce…
english: Mr. Ertugrul, long before he saved Halima Sultan from the shroud...
Ertuğrul was in the heart of Gökçe.

text: Senin ağzında çıkanı kulağın işitir mi?
english: Do you hear what you're saying?
I'd rather rot my tongue than say that to you.

text: Bütün bunlara çocukluk der geçerdim Lakin…
english: I'd call it childhood, but...
But what?

text: Lakin Halime Sultan’la evlendikten sonra da Gökçe içindeki ateşi söküp atamamış…
english: But Halima didn't get rid of the fire in Gökçe after she was married to Sultan.
...but he still wanted to marry you, son.
Enough!
Enough.
Enough.
Do you mind, Mother?
Come on, girl.

text: Hayırlı geceler dilemek için gelmiştim ana
english: I just came to say good night, ma'am.
Good night, girl.
What is it, Mother?
Nothing. Good night.
Good night.
Is there anything I can do for you, sir?
I'm tired. I just want to sleep.
My lord, I know your pain is fresh

text: Lakin bana diyemediğin ne varsa gayrı diyesin
english: But you can call me anything you can't.

text: Ertuğrul’a bir vakitler gönül verdiğin doğru mu?
english: Is it true that you once loved Ertugrul?
Is it true, Gökçe?
That's right, sir.
Ya
What about Ertugrul?

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im beni hep bir kardeş olarak gördü
